addressList - Variable in class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.model.Person
Private field that contains a list of Addresses that this Person has JPAAnnotations: ManyToMany: Describes that within the domain of relational entities, this is a many to many relation; JoinTable: Describes the name of the join table and by which keys they are joined (person_id, address_id)
AddressNotFoundException - Exception in com.ramineqbal.personbackend.exception
AddressNotFoundException is a subclass of RuntimeException and should be used if an Address within com.ramineqbal.personbackend is not found.
AddressNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception com.ramineqbal.personbackend.exception.AddressNotFoundException
 
AddressRepository - Interface in com.ramineqbal.personbackend.repository
AddressRepository class extending JpaRepository class; Will be instantiated via dependency injection by Spring and implements several database operations (inherited from JpaRepository).
addressRepository - Variable in class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service.AddressService
This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object
addressRepository - Variable in class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service.PersonService
This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object; Is used to map already existing databases to newly added persons before creating a new address
AddressService - Class in com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service
AddressService class, annotated with Service (origin: org.springframework.stereotype.Service) Used as intermediary class between AddressRepository (Database-Interface) and AddressController (API-Controller) and essentially implements the functionality of the methods invoked by the API
AddressService(AddressRepository) - Constructor for class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service.AddressService
Constructor which will instantiate AddressService with a dependency injected instance of AddressRepository

I

id - Variable in class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.model.Address
The private id field defined as long.
JPAAnnotations: Id: to clarify that this field is the identifier of the object GeneratedValue: Specifies the Id Generation Type as AUTO Column: Defines the column traits so that id has to be not null and can never be updated.
id - Variable in class com.ramineqbal.personbackend.model.Person
The private id field defined as long.
JPAAnnotations: Id: to clarify that this field is the identifier of the object GeneratedValue: Specifies the Id Generation Type as AUTO Column: Defines the column traits so that id has to be not null and can never be updated.

Private field that contains a list of Persons that this address is used by
JPAAnnotations: ManyToMany: Describes that within the domain of relational entities, this is a many to many relations; This ManyToMany relationship is mapped by com.ramineqbal.personbackend.model.Person.addressList;
